summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) training participant sign-in log for a course titled 'Suicide Prevention/SFR Training' held on December 7, 2018. It includes a list of participants with BOP IDs and signatures, and outlines training objectives focused on understanding suicide risk in locked units and single cells, identifying high-risk inmate groups, and reviewing management strategies and emergency response procedures.

events.title: Suicide Prevention Training
events.description: A Bureau of Prisons training course titled 'Suicide Prevention/SFR Training' was conducted, covering suicide risk in locked units, identifying high-risk inmate groups, and reviewing management strategies and emergency procedures.

keyFacts: The document is a BOP training participant sign-in log for a 'Suicide Prevention/SFR Training' course.
The training was held on December 7, 2018, and focused on suicide risk in locked units and single cells.
Training objectives included identifying high-risk inmate groups such as the mentally ill, behavior disordered inmates, sex offenders, and high custody inmates.
The log contains participant signatures and BOP IDs, indicating staff attendance and certification of understanding the material.
The document is marked 'SENSITIVE - LIMITED OFFICIAL USE'.
